title: Can't download client
body:
The page to download client (mac) is not working. Just hangs forever when I click the download button

pls fix

replies.body: The actual page itself, or the installer?  Can you verify the link you're using?  I'd like to take a look!

https://i.imgur.com/KlbHWVN.jpg

i go to my username at top right hand of the page, click game download, takes me here: https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload ,click that download the game button in picture and it does nothing

Hey thanks!  Are you on a Mac or Windows OS?  I was able to select the download without issues, pretty strange. Try some of these steps in case a browser issue could be blocking you:  Clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), disable extensions, run Incognito, or try another browser entirely.  Let me know if any of that helps.
i'm on mac and it seems like it is a google fiber issue (From other posts) which i have no idea how to solve
None of that worked for me and I'm on windows
